title: In-N-Out Cheeseburger Calories
meta_description: Discover in and out cheeseburger calories, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, and quick tweaks for custom orders.
assumptions: Standard single cheeseburger with beef patty, American cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread, and bun; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, ingredient sourcing, custom orders, and preparation; check In-N-Out's official site or app for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A standard In-N-Out cheeseburger contains 480 calories and 22 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Animal style (extra spread, mustard, grilled onions, pickles)
Protein style (wrapped in lettuce, no bun)

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out cheeseburger?
What are the macros for In-N-Out cheeseburger calories?
faqs.a: 39 g carbs, 27 g fat, 22 g protein.

faqs.q: Does the In-N-Out cheeseburger have trans fat?
faqs.a: About 0.5 g trans fat per burger from the beef and spread.

faqs.q: How much sodium in In-N-Out cheeseburger?
Are In-N-Out cheeseburger calories the same as a hamburger?
faqs.a: Noâ€”the cheese adds about 70 calories; hamburger is around 410 kcal.
